channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large Dead Tree Limbs At Risk Of Falling, 31st May
item.description:
There are two large tree limbs which are dead and at risk of falling on the tree outside 2 Sydenham Road North - please can these be removed before someone is injured when they fall…..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Sydenham Road North, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of weeds all along kerb line in Oldfield road, 31st May
item.description:
Hi, a lot of the kerbs in Oldfield road have foot high weeds growing out of them all. It’s making the area look very run down. We all pay enough council tax please could a team come and remove them and spray weed killer? If it was just a few I would do them myself but there’s too many.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oldfield Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light needs replacing, 31st May
item.description:
The street light outside no. 1 was damaged by a skip lorry, it has been made safe (about 2 weeks ago) but now it needs replacing. Please ensure that when replace the pavements are made good in the same materials used when the pavements were replaced NOT black tarmac.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moor Court Drive, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 31st May
item.description:
Fridge left in footpath
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking on junctions, no road markings, 31st May
item.description:
On the junction of Barnaby Road and Sunrise Avenue there are cars parked on the junction, which narrows the road to 1 car width, and makes the junction blind when both entering and leaving. This is very dangerous, coupled with pedestrians being forced to walk in the road due to pavement parking and bins blocking the pavements. The addition of double yellow lines would greatly reduce this risk and ensure safe parking and a clear junction. Parking on junctions is also a problem along all of Sunrise Avenue as there have been no road markings since the estate was built in 2012. another dangerous area is where the road adjoins Gotherington lane. And where the traffic calming has been added midway down Sunrise Avenue. There are so many blind spots as cars are parking close to these junctions because there are no parking restrictions.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Barnaby Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds growing rampant along street., 31st May
item.description:
Reported numerous times by several times. No clean up or weed spraying happening

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Pittville Crescent Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very unsafe overgrown tree lower branches for Road users and pedestrians, 31st May
item.description:
It’s very unsafe for Road users as well as pedestrians. Today the tree maintenance team was in this street they said they have 5 jobs on this road today, but the two workers sat on the truck for one hour chatting, they didn’t do anything then they left.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Parade, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 12” pothole on Mill Lane, Prestbury, 31st May
item.description:
In mill Lane, above the crossroads in the lane, past The Mill, just before the street light on the left hand side of the road, before you get to Headlands. The pot hole has been there for at least 6 years, getting worse by the year.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Three potholes in narrow section of Andover Street, 31st May
item.description:
At its northern end Andover Street, Cheltenham, narrows to a single width carriageway. There is a large pothole at the northern (Suffolk Road) end, a smaller one at the southern end of the narrow section of carriageway and a smaller one in between these two.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Suffolk Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
